text.content:
These tactics enable your squad to move around the battlefield more efficiently.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.Sv20w0a6YiJJPhqV]{Defensive Retreat}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.NNe3nmxvHRKq7pLZ]{Form Up!}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.xhKTAviKlSejEcjv]{Mountaineering Training}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.4ZqPPkujC6jEAywn]{Naval Training}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.svyN9jvVjhUCpdCM]{Passage of Lines}

The fundamental strategies of war used by many commanders are recorded below. When you first gain your commander's folio at 1st level, choose four tactics from the list below; as you increase in level (or if you take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-class-feats.Item.8WArTn7SsR0zW9Io]{Tactical Expansion} feat), you will gain additional tactics.

These tactics help your allies attack, reposition, or resist enemy forces.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.Nro2w7tdNgJjbIDd]{Coordinating Maneuvres}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.NJF1F4hOg6FhU0Ui]{Double Team}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.RpNX2jgfAnZwutyM]{End It!}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.E2HAKKPFCLwnR9I3]{Pincer Attack}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.cahp1N1uYPwnX9GG]{Reload!}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.ZuMvrjijQ6ou1fzS]{Shields Up!}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.EI19Z7zrb4j86MnQ]{Strike Hard}

You can choose from among these tactics when you add a new tactic to your folio if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-class-features.Item.kTdOwsfhf4g5AU2s]{Expert Tactician} class feature.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.cu2tUjuOGCdQPR6P]{Piranha Assault}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.7L2ahcmJR8V93BS3]{Stupefying Raid}

You can choose from among these tactics when you add a new tactic to your folio if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-class-features.Item.jH3IFSytL2uH98cH]{Master Tactician} class feature.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.scXmGuWIigC9v6g2]{Demoralizing Charge}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.bFyd9BjOO7unubMN]{Ready, Aim, Fire!}

You can choose from among these tactics when you add a new tactic to your folio if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-class-features.Item.HnocT6RD3bzpRNQN]{Legendary Tactician} class feature.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.jwvF4O4L1S88Zx9v]{Executioner's Volley}

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.battlecry-playtest-actions.Item.IhSLrl8uJk3DXaDh]{Valkyrie's Charge}
